name: Monster Rebirth(English Fixed Version)
description:
How it differs from the other one

Bgm is renamed because some people's system can't read those named by Japanese. You don't need to download this one if you can play the game.

You can see the original one here.

Monster Rebirth

Introduction

The evil has destory almost the world.

The monsters you beat in the dungeon will join you party.

That's what we call "Monster Rebirth", or the resurrection of monsters from the dark.

And we could fight until the last monster dead in your party.

Features

47 difference kinds of monsters could join your party

You can use all of your monsters in a battle without limit.Defeat the Boss by powerful monsters or rush it by hundreds of weak monsters .

197 synthetic organisms in this game, you can make your own monster.

4 Roguelike dungeon.

Credits

Monster System, Roguelike Dungeon System, Unlimited Battle System are developed by myself.

Graphics

animated battlers - made by Aekashics

UI - made by Krachware

Background - made by 背景専門店みにくる

Icons

森の奥の隠れ里    PONETI    Iconfinder

Plugins

Yanfly Engine    Mog Plugins    DekitaRPG    FlyCat(飞猫云工作室)    JP_battle_hp(青灯独酌)    Drill    TTK_DraggableCamera

Music

Elysion -Sanctuary- 音楽素材版

RPG用音楽素材集 [Yuggdrasill Seed]

Both from 趣味工房にんじんわいん

Character Design

黒梅拉
